name: send_sms
description: Send SMS message via 46elks Swedish telecommunications

to.description: Recipient phone number with country code (e.g., +46XXXXXXXXX for Swedish numbers)

message.description: SMS message content (max 160 characters for single SMS)

from.description: Sender phone number or name (optional, uses default if not specified)

flashsms.description: Set to 'yes' for flash SMS that displays immediately (optional)

dry_run.description: Test mode - verify request without sending actual SMS (optional)

limit.description: Maximum number of messages to retrieve (default: 10, max: 100)

name: check_sms_status
description: Check delivery status and details of a sent SMS

message_id.description: 46elks message ID returned when SMS was sent

name: check_account_balance
description: Check 46elks account balance and account information

name: estimate_sms_cost
description: Estimate cost and message segments for SMS without sending it

to.description: Recipient phone number with country code

message.description: SMS message content to estimate cost for

name: get_delivery_statistics
description: Get SMS delivery statistics and success rates from recent messages

limit.description: Number of recent messages to analyze (default: 50, max: 100)
